contextId.occurrenceNote: The words "Turn your ear" and "listen" mean the same thing and add emphasis to the plea. Alternate translation: "Yahweh, please listen to what he is saying" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
contextId.glQuote: Turn your ear, Yahweh, and listen

contextId.occurrenceNote: The words "Open your eyes" and "see" mean the same thing and add emphasis to the plea. Alternate translation: "Yahweh, please pay attention to what is happening" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
contextId.glQuote: Open your eyes, Yahweh, and see

contextId.occurrenceNote: These words all share similar meanings. Together they emphasize everything that Yahweh had commanded in the law. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublet]])
contextId.glQuote: his commandments, his regulations, and his statutes
